item.title: Simple to solve, need a code
item.dc:creator: @I_Vlrus_I I Vlrus I
item.description:
@I_Vlrus_I wrote:

[quote=“dr jekyll, post:1, topic:23542”]Well basically i have this here code and rite now it teleports u underwater ( the underwater part from recipe for disaster) but only lets you if you have a fishbowl helmet in your inventory, i was wonderin if anybody know the code that made it so that you could only go if you had it equipped on your head, instead of just having it.
Thnx in advance

else if (command.startsWith(“undersea”))
if((playerHasItemAmount(7534, 1)==false) )
{
sendMessage(“You need a Fishbowl Helmet.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(7534, 1)==true) )
{
teleportToX = 2991;
teleportToY = 9518;
sendMessage(“Under da water!”);
}[br][size=1]Posted at: November 09, 2006, 01:57:39 PM[/size][hr] :mad:[/quote]
you should make a void and change “if((playerHasItemAmount(7534, 1)==false) )” to “yourvoid() = true”
and the void should be ,if player equipment playerhat 734 or something,“yourvoid() = true”

Read full topic

item.title: Simple to solve, need a code

item.description:
@dr_jekyll wrote:

Well basically i have this here code and rite now it teleports u underwater ( the underwater part from recipe for disaster) but only lets you if you have a fishbowl helmet in your inventory, i was wonderin if anybody know the code that made it so that you could only go if you had it equipped on your head, instead of just having it.
Thnx in advance

else if (command.startsWith(“undersea”))
if((playerHasItemAmount(7534, 1)==false) )
{
sendMessage(“You need a Fishbowl Helmet.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(7534, 1)==true) )
{
teleportToX = 2991;
teleportToY = 9518;
sendMessage(“Under da water!”);
}[br][size=1]Posted at: November 09, 2006, 01:57:39 PM[/size][hr] :mad:
